name: Pendaflex File Folders, Letter Size, 1/3 Cut, Manila, 250 per Box (752250)
short_description: TRIED AND TRUE: Pendaflex File Folders letter size slip seamlessly into many existing filing systems and are easy to label and easy to read
1/3-CUT TABS IN ASSORTED POSITIONS: Tabs are staggered from left to right for perfect visibility in your vertical or lateral file cabinet
LETTER-SIZE FOLDERS: Folders fit standard 8-1/2" x 11" documents; use alone or with hanging file folders
STOCK-UP SHOP and DONE: This never-out necessity comes with 250 letter-size file folders per box and makes re-orders quick and convenient
WAVE GOODBYE TO CLUTTER: Several boxes and a good filing plan put you on your way to a clear desk and wide open spaces
product_description: Big projects and growing teams call for a filing solution that can keep up. The Pendaflex Manila File Folders 250-count bulk pack gives you the volume you need to organize entire file cabinets, set up multiple workstations, or overhaul both home and office systems at once. Each letter-size folder is designed for 8.5"" x 11"" documents and works seamlessly with standard file drawers, hanging folders, desktop sorters, and file boxes, so you can integrate them into your existing setup. The 1/3-cut tabs are positioned in three staggered locations (left, center, and right), making labels visible at a glance. Whether you’re managing vendor records, employee files, lesson plans, or household documents, this simple tab layout turns crowded drawers into clearly marked rows. There’s plenty of room for names, dates, and descriptive file titles, so anyone using the system can quickly understand what’s inside each folder. Constructed from sturdy, premium manila stock, these folders are made for active, high-traffic use. The score lines along the bottom allow the folders to expand slightly as you add pages, helping them stay tidy even as your paperwork grows. With 250 folders in a single box, you can standardize filing across departments, keep plenty on hand for new clients or projects, or share one carton among several teachers, team members, or family members. Pendaflex makes versatile, easy-to-use organization tools for schools, homes, and workplaces, helping real people save time, cut clutter, and stay productive. (Manufacturer Item Number: 752250).

product_description: Island manila file folders provide dependable, everyday organization for home offices, schools, and businesses that need a simple and durable way to manage paperwork. Made from premium paper stock, these folders hold up to frequent handling, helping keep documents clean, flat, and protected as you sort assignments, bills, reports, tax forms, or project notes. Each folder includes a 1/3-cut tab in an assorted position, giving you plenty of room for clear labeling so you can quickly identify categories and find what you need without digging through stacks of paper. Designed in standard letter size, they fit seamlessly into common filing systems, including file drawers, desktop file boxes, and hanging file folders, making it easy to build an organized setup that works in any workspace. The generous 100-count pack supports long-term filing projects and high-volume organization, whether you’re setting up subject folders for students, managing client paperwork, or creating categories for household documents. These manila folders offer a clean, classic look suitable for professional and personal use, with reliable strength that helps prevent tearing or bending over time. Ideal for school supplies, home office organization, and general document storage, Island file folders make it simple to maintain an efficient filing system that keeps important paperwork accessible and neatly arranged.
